sub_title: Experienced Policy Officer | Double Master's Degree, Stakeholder Relations, Analytical Skills
summary:
I am a Policy Officer at Bureau Financieel Toezicht (BFT), an independent regulator that oversees the work of notaries, court bailiffs, and other Wwft-obliged professions. I work with these professionals to ensure compliance and supervision, and I also build and maintain relationships with the professional associations and the ministries of Finance and Justice and Security, facilitating collaboration and communication on external affairs.

With a Master of Science degree in public policy and human development from United Nations University-MERIT and Maastricht University, I have a strong background in foreign policy and innovation, sciences and technology. I have 9+ years of experience in working with interparliamentary EU delegations, diplomats, leading MNCs, FinTechs and their Asian counterparts across various sectors. I have led and contributed to multiple projects, events, and publications, delivering effective results and insights on topics such as cybersecurity, sustainable finance, and innovation. I have also developed strong analytical, communication, and leadership skills, as well as a global network and a keen interest in learning and leveraging my strategic expertise.
